com.hush.pgp.io.packets
Class PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      com.hush.pgp.io.packets.PacketContentInputStream
          com.hush.pgp.io.packets.PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
PgpConstants, java.io.Closeable
public class PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream
extends PacketContentInputStream

A stream to read in a PGP public key encrypted session key.
The getters should be used to retrieve all information from this stream. The standard read methods will just return EOF.

Constructor Detail

PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream

public PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream(java.io.InputStream in)
Creates a PublicKeyEncryptedSessionKeyInputStream and saves the argument, the input stream in for later use. In most cases in should be a PacketInputStream.

Parameters:
in - the underlying input stream
Throws:
DataFormatException - if there is a problem with the PGP data
java.io.IOException - if an exception is thrown from the underyling stream
